pages.title: Thermal Core
pages.text: The heart of all ORSA heating devices. This compact heat cell uses blaze powder and magma cream to generate sustained warmth.$(br2)Required for crafting the Thermal Heater and Geothermal Core. Gather blaze rods from the Nether early â€” you won't want to go there later.
Surround an iron ingot with blaze powder on three sides, magma cream below.
